Class UserDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.UserDAO
public class UserDAO extends Object
UserDAO

Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing user records in the Soccer Management System database.

Provides methods for:

  • User login verification.
  • Creating a new user.
  • Checking if an email exists.
  • Fetching user details by email.
  • Updating user password.

Example Usage: 

 String role = UserDAO.UserLogin("loay", "1234", "Admin");
 boolean created = UserDAO.CreateUser("loay", "1234", "loay@email.com", "Admin");
 boolean exists = UserDAO.isEmailExists("loay@email.com");
 User user = UserDAO.getUserByEmail("loay@email.com");
 boolean updated = UserDAO.updatePassword("loay@email.com", "newpass123");

  • Method Details

    • UserLogin

      public static String UserLogin(String username, String password, String selectedRole)
      UserLogin Verifies user credentials and role.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      password - the password of the user
      selectedRole - the role selected by the user
      Returns:
      role if login succeeds, "ROLE_MISMATCH" if role does not match, "INVALID" if username/password incorrect, "ERROR" if exception occurs

    • CreateUser

      public static boolean CreateUser(String username, String password, String email, String role)
      CreateUser Inserts a new user into the database.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the new user
      password - password of the new user
      email - email of the new user
      role - role of the new user (Admin/Viewer/etc.)
      Returns:
      true if creation succeeds, false otherwise

    • isEmailExists

      public static boolean isEmailExists(String email)
      isEmailExists Checks if an email is already registered in the database.
      Parameters:
      email - email to check
      Returns:
      true if email exists, false otherwise

    • getUserByEmail

      public static User getUserByEmail(String email)
      getUserByEmail Fetches a User object by email.
      Parameters:
      email - email of the user
      Returns:
      User object if found, null otherwise

    • updatePassword

      public static boolean updatePassword(String email, String newPassword)
      updatePassword Updates the password of a user based on email.
      Parameters:
      email - email of the user
      newPassword - new password to set
      Returns:
      true if update succeeds, false otherwise
